items.sentence: Tom was very interested in sports when he was young.
Even though Tom is sick, he\'s swimming again today.
I hope you don\'t think I\'m as obnoxious as Tom is.
Tom asked Mary to continue doing what she was doing.
Tom met several carpenters when he was in Australia.
Tom is working at the new restaurant on Park Street.
Tom asked if there was anything he could do to help.
Tom asked me to ask you if you want to come with us.
Tom asked me to go to Boston with Mary next weekend.
Tom said that Mary shouldn\'t have done that inside.
